LanguageData.MakeSulfur.label: 정제 중 : 유황 10개
LanguageData.MakeSulfur.description: 정제 중 : 유황 from 강철 광석. 유황 occurs naturally as the pure element - native 유황 and as sulfide and sulfate minerals. It is useful for 화약 in 제작 중 : various types of 포탑 ammo. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakePowder.label: 제작 : 화약 20개
LanguageData.MakePowder.description: Makes 화약 that is useful for 제작 중 : ammo shells for 포탑s. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeNapalm.label: 제작 : 네이팜
LanguageData.MakeNapalm.description: Makes 네이팜, a flammable chemical weapon. Produces 10.
